page.title: 07LINE FISHING ON SCORAIG
page.content:
LINE FISHING ON SCORAIG
LINE FISHING IS JUST A PASSTIME. SOME PEOPLE DO IT FOR FOOD,OTHERS FOR FUN.MOST PEOPLE ON SCORAIG FISH FOR FOOD--CODLING,HADDOCK,POLLACK,MACKEREL AND SKATE.THE SEABED ON THE SOUTH SIDE OF THE PENINSULA IS SANDY BUT ROCKY IN SOME PLACES,WHILE ON THE NORTH SIDE THERE IS MAINLY SEAWEED AND ROCK. BOAT FISHING IS NECESSARY IN ORDER TO CATCH SKATE,HADDOCK,CODLING,COD, LITHE AND MACKEREL. SHORE FISHING IS DONE OFF PIERS OR OFF THE ROCKS IN DEEP WATER.THE KINDS YOU ARE LIKELY TO CATCH ARE POLLACK, COALFISH,WHITING,ROCKLING AND FLATFISH. MANY PEOPLE SELL WINKLES TO COMMERCIAL BUYERS.
